summary: MAJOR BLIND AREA IN THE BACK OF THE LEXUS RX300.  MR.  THE CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO SEE SMALL CHILDREN WHEN BACKING UP THE VEHICLE.  A BEEPING DEVICE WAS INSTALLED TO WORN CHILDREN/PEDESTRIANS WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS BACKING UP, INSTEAD THE LOUD NOISE ATTRACTS THE CHILDREN.  (THE CONSUMER NEEDED TO BE GUIDED)  THE 2004 VERSION CAME EQUIPPED WITH A CAMERA. THE CONSUMER FELT THERE MUST HAVE BEEN A SIMILAR PROBLEM WHEN BACKING UP.  THE DEALER REFUSED TO INSTALL A CAMERA ON THE CONSUMERS VEHICLE. * SCC     *JB
